item.title: Linux Privilege Escalation - Shared Object Injection
item.author: Author
item.description: Video Setting Up Install the required packages for this video: 1 low@ubuntu:~$ sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y vim gcc Now clear the screen: 1 low@ubuntu:~$ clear Let’s start by creating a working directory: 1 2 3 4 low@ubuntu:~$ mkdir so-files low@ubuntu:~$ cd !$ cd so-files low@ubuntu:~/so-files$ We’ll create a file named libcustom.c: 1 low@ubuntu:~/so-files$ vim libcustom.c This print a message and nothing more:
